name: hexgrid-map
description: Data studio visualization for a hexgrid map

scripts.prebuild: (cat node_modules/@google/dscc/_bundles/dscc.min.js; echo) > bundle.js && for f in simple-statistics d3-hexgrid d3; do (cat "node_modules/${f}/dist/${f}.min.js"; echo) >> bundle.js; done && echo "Prebuild finished!"
scripts.build: (cat bundle.js; echo; cat src/hexgrid-map.js) > main.js && echo "Build finished!"
scripts.upload: gsutil cp -a public-read src/* gs://hexgrid-map-dev && gsutil cp -a public-read main.js gs://hexgrid-map-dev && gsutil cp -a public-read src/manifest.json gs://hexgrid-map-dev

author: Ariel Perez
